fullplot: A 'kidnapper' holds a girl hostage until a ransom demand is paid from her father. In reality, the kidnapper is actually an advertiser, who has been beaten to a 3 billion deal and so takes his Rival's daughter hostage. The girl later turns out to be more than she seems and turns into a handful for her 'kidnapper'...
plot: Kidnapping and deceit abound in this thriller. From romance to mild-action, this movie has it all.
title: G@me
